name: Oh My God, I'm Alive
description:
A twin stick shooter for Pico 8. Made for Jam, Baby, Jam! 2021

esdf to move

mouse to shoot

ctrl R to restart

I'm hoping to do more work on this in the future, but ran out of time in the jam. So it goes.

updates:

2021-04-26: fixed player hitbox, added limited mobile support (not pretty but technically works)

2021-04-26: fixed glitch where you can still move after game ends on mobile
